Document: # Rule 6: Follow Naming Conventions - In-character names must fit the server standards of: [color=#ffe59d]* Doesn't make obvious references * Doesn't disturb roleplay * Isn't obscene[/color] OR [color=#ffe59d]* Is a result of random name generation.[/color] - The only exception to the above is that theatrical roles like clown, boxer, and mime are allowed stage names with some freedom, as long as it is not obscene.
